story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_0100:
Mwahahaha! How glorious! This is the true power
of a Dynamax sync pair!
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_0200:
Such overwhelming strength! THIS is what I was
trying to achieve!
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_0300:
I can’t believe he just destroyed his hideout with a
max move...
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_0400:
Mega Evolution and Dynamax together are
unbelievably powerful...
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_0500:
I see you’re incapable of doing anything by
yourself, as always.
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_0700:
Those Trainers took out your horde of grunts
earlier, so their Pokémon were already tired.
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_0800:
You think you can talk big after beating an
opponent that’s already been weakened for you?
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_0900: That is simply what an organization does.
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_1000:
Indeed. Bringing together individuals is more
efficient and allows you to wield much
more power.
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_1100:
There’s no reason why we shouldn’t make use of
such power. Do you not understand that, child?
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_1200:
Big talk for cowards who can’t do anything
without Giovanni around. Face it—you’re
just too weak to work alone.
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_1300: Even a child like me can see that. Why can’t you?
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_1400:
How dare you say that! You have no idea what
we’ve been through—
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_1500:
I suppose you’ve gotten strong enough to back up
that argument, have you?
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_1600:
Of course. While you all were pretending to
be friends, I was busy training.
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_1700:
I can take care of this all by myself. This is how it
should’ve been from the start.
story_teamrocket_02_11000/2401_1201_1800: We’ll settle this once and for all...old man!
